description:
In Python, we're trying to solve packaging problems in our own domain,
but maybe someone else already solved most our problems.

In the talk I'll show how I develop and deploy Python projects that can
be easily mixed with non-Python dependencies.

http://nixos.org/nix/ will be demonstrated to replace technologies in
our stack: pip, virtualenv, buildout, ansible, jenkins.
title: Rethinking packaging, development and deployment
